dcterms:creator: Y. Jia
M. T. Ramanovich
dcterms:description: The CVSS-C corpus is derived from the CoVoST 2 and Common Voice corpora, containing sentence-level paired S2ST data in 21 X→English language pairs, with 1,153 hours of human read speech and 719 hours of high-quality TTS synthetic speech.
dcterms:title: CVSS-C corpus

dcterms:creator: C. Wang
A. Wu
J. Gu
J. Pino
dcterms:description: CoVoST 2 is a multilingual speech translation corpus that provides paired speech and text data across multiple languages, facilitating research in speech-to-speech translation.
dcterms:title: CoVoST 2

dcterms:creator: R. Ardila
M. Branson
K. Davis
dcterms:description: Common Voice is a massively-multilingual speech corpus that provides a large amount of voice data for various languages, aimed at improving speech recognition and synthesis systems.
dcterms:title: Common Voice

dcterms:creator: V. Pratap
Q. Xu
A. Sriram
dcterms:description: MLS is a large-scale multilingual dataset designed for speech research, providing a diverse set of speech data across multiple languages.
dcterms:title: MLS

dcterms:creator: M. J. Gales
K. M. Knill
A. Ragni
S. P. Rath
dcterms:description: The Babel project focuses on speech recognition and keyword spotting for low-resource languages, providing datasets for research in these areas.
dcterms:title: Babel

dcterms:creator: L. Xue
N. Constant
A. Roberts
M. Kale
R. Al-Rfou
A. Siddhant
A. Barua
C. Raffel
dcterms:description: mC4 is a massively multilingual text corpus designed for training language models and other NLP tasks, containing a vast amount of text data across multiple languages.
dcterms:title: mC4

dcterms:creator: L. Barrault
M. Biesialska
O. Bojar
M. R. Costa-jussà
dcterms:description: WMT is a conference that provides datasets for machine translation, including various language pairs and evaluation metrics.
dcterms:title: WMT

dcterms:creator: Y. Qi
D. S. Sachan
M. Felix
S. J. Padmanabhan
G. Neubig
dcterms:description: TED provides a dataset of talks that can be used for various tasks, including machine translation and speech recognition.
dcterms:title: TED
